section.title: Action Bar
section.p: The action bar contains three filter options to help you find applications quickly; Favorites, Categories and A to Z.

sectiondiv.p: You can mark an application you use frequently as a favorite. The Favorites menu gives you quick access to your marked applications.
Applications are grouped by category. Categories are listed alphabetically. Applications within each category are also listed alphabetically.
Applications are listed alphabetically from A to Z.

section.title: Application Search
section.p:
Find an application by typing its name in the Application Search box. As soon as you start typing, any matches to your search will be displayed underneath.

section.title: Application List
section.p: The application list contains all the applications you have access to. To launch an application, click its name. Next to each application is a icon, a icon, and a icon. Click to get more information on the application. Click to mark or unmark the application as a favorite. indicates that clicking this app will open it in a new tab.
